  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MatchData getInstance()
      This method instantiates and returns the MatchData singleton if not already existent, otherwise it only returns the existent one.
      Returns:
      an instance of MatchData.

    • makeGraphicalBoardEqualToBoard

      public void makeGraphicalBoardEqualToBoard()
      This method makes the GraphicalBoard equal to the board by updating workers' positions and buildings. Also temporary buildings counter is restored to the last backup.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method instantiates the MatchData attributes needed to start a new match.

    • decrementCounter

      public void decrementCounter​(BuildingType building, int howMany)
      This method decrements the building counter given the quantity and its BuildingType.
      Parameters:
      building - is the given BuildingType.
      howMany - is the given quantity to decrement.

    • decrementCounter

      public void decrementCounter​(BuildingType building)
      This method decrements by one the building counter given and its BuildingType.
      Parameters:
      building - is the given BuildingType.

    • decrementTempCounter

      public void decrementTempCounter​(BuildingType building, int howMany)
      This method decrements the temporary building counter given the quantity and its BuildingType.
      Parameters:
      building - is the given BuildingType.
      howMany - is the given quantity to decrement.

    • decrementTempCounter

      public void decrementTempCounter​(BuildingType building)
      This method decrements by one the temporary building counter given its BuildingType.
      Parameters:
      building - is the given BuildingType.

    • getClient

      public Client getClient()
      This method returns the Client instance.
      Returns:
      a Client.

    • getBuildingsTempCounter

      public java.util.Map<BuildingType,​java.lang.Integer> getBuildingsTempCounter()
      Getter for the temporary buildings counter.
      Returns:
      a map that associates BuildingType to the current available number (not the confirmed number after the board updating).

    • getGraphicalBoard

      public GraphicalBoard getGraphicalBoard()
      This method returns the Graphical Board instance.
      Returns:
      a GraphicalBoard.

    • getAllCards

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getAllCards()
      This method returns the cards received from the server.
      Returns:
      a Map that associates cards' names to their descriptions.

    • getIds

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getIds()
      This method returns the ids received from the server.
      Returns:
      a Map that associates player' ids to their List of workers' ids.

    • getPlayersColor

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.Color> getPlayersColor()
      This method returns the players' colors received from the server.
      Returns:
      a Map that associates players' ids to their colors.

    • getPlayersCards

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Pair<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> getPlayersCards()
      This method returns the players' cards.
      Returns:
      a Map that associates players to their cards.

    • isHardcore

      public boolean isHardcore()
      This method returns a boolean based on the current game-mode.
      Returns:
      true if the match is on hardcore mode, false otherwise.

    • getPlayerName

      public java.lang.String getPlayerName()
      This method returns the user nickname.
      Returns:
      a String containing the nickname.
